mapper.insert: replace INTO `share`.`share_concept_sts_top` ( `simple_name`, `concept_name`, `trading_date`, `count`, `type` ) SELECT sci.simple_name, sci.`concept_name`, price.TRADING_DATE, COUNT(1), #{type} FROM `share_concept_detail` scd INNER JOIN `share_concept_info` sci ON sci.`simple_name` = scd.`simple_name` INNER JOIN (SELECT si.`SHARE_CODE`, si.`SHARE_NAME`, sp.`PRICE_CHANGE_RATIO`, sp.TRADING_DATE FROM `share_price` sp INNER JOIN `share_info` si ON sp.`ID_SHARE_INFO` = si.`ID_SHARE_INFO` WHERE sp.`TRADING_DATE` = #{date} ORDER BY PRICE_CHANGE_RATIO DESC LIMIT #{limit}) AS price ON price.SHARE_CODE = scd.`share_code` GROUP BY sci.simple_name
